name: Halloween Pumpkin - Pinball
description:
Halloween Pumpkin - Pinball

If you love Pinball then this is the most classic Pinball game for you! You will be stunned with the level of realism and cutting-edge visuals.

Tap the ball to launch, tap left and right side to operate the paddles! Enjoy!

Some of the features of Pinball Deluxe:
- Gorgeous graphics
- Easy to see the ball
- Great gameplay
- Very precise physics
